stripped_text: Subroutine For the remainder of this run, while the Runner is encountering another piece of ice, it gains "Subroutine End the run." after its other subroutines.
text: [subroutine] For the remainder of this run, while the Runner is encountering another piece of ice, it gains "[subroutine] End the run." after its other subroutines.
title: Sensei
